name: Avalanche!
description:
A homage to Ski Free. Ski down the mountain dodging obstacles and scoring points by going off jumps. Watch out for avalanches caused by turning too much and hitting jumps. "End Game" arrives at a distance of 3,000 with an homage to the Ski Free Yeti.

Controls: A & D to ski.

This was submitted as part of the Unreal Engine #UE4Jam for the month of December 2016 with the theme of "Snowball Effect".
